pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Staggered Difference-in-Difference Estimators // A fast and flexible implementation of Callaway and Sant'Anna's (2021)doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2020.12.001 staggered Difference- in-Differences (DiD) estimators, 'fastdid' reduces the computation time from hours to seconds, and incorporates extensions such as time-varying covariates and multiple events.
